text: Pokémon Ultra Sun and Pokémon Ultra Moon are role-playing games in the 7th generation of Pokémon. It was released on the Nintendo 3DS in 2017. They are improved versions of Pokémon Sun and Moon, the games that released a year before. Category:2017 video games Category:Pokémon RPGs Category:Game Freak games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Nintendo 3DS games Category:Nintendo Network games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Pokémon Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon
